titleHead: [CY] Are you an appointee - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: [CY] Are you an 'appointee'?
description: [CY] You’re an appointee if you’ve been appointed by DWP to act on behalf of someone who is unable to deal with their benefit claim. For example, a parent who is claiming on behalf of a child.

isAppointee.label: [CY] Select whether you're an appointee or not
isAppointee.yes: [CY] I have been appointed by DWP to act on behalf of someone else

error.required: [CY] You need to answer the question before continuing
